queries.query: Can I arrange my own hire car without prior consent?
relevant_docs: we will arrange a hire car for you you must not arrange your own hire car under any circumstances unless you obtain our prior written consent by contacting us on 131 123 if you do then we may decide not to pay for the hire car  your vehicle must be not drivable unsafe to drive or in for repairswe will arrange a hire car for you and will do our best to arrange a car that meets your needs33keys locks and barrels if someone steals the keys to your vehicle during the
